text.section: Each licensee shall display the license conspicuously in the place of business of the licensee.

A licensee and an employee of a licensee shall:
carry a valid photo identification card issued by a licensed locksmith under § 12.5-207 of this subtitle at all times the licensee or employee of a licensee is engaged in providing locksmith services; and
display the valid photo identification card as required by regulation.
If a photo identification card is lost or destroyed, the licensee immediately shall notify the licensed locksmith that issued the photo identification card.

section.section: On receipt of the application, fee, and any required documentation, the Secretary shall issue a new license bearing the new name of the licensee.
